pageProps.firstSectionText: Web and mobile applications for modern products and services that need to stand out from competitors or surprise a sophisticated user.

fields.title:
We get along well with companies 
from the fields of

howWeWork.title: how we work
howWeWork.description: Our approach is maximum transparency for the client

list.title: Honest Time & Material
list.text: Payment based on the time spent with reference to the preliminary assessment made at the beginning of the project. The assessment is free, btw.

list.title: Weekly reports
list.text: Every week there is a report on how much time was spent and on what. The following week - discussion of the result, feedback.

list.title: Research and analytics
list.text: If necessary, we will conduct surveys of target audience representatives, customer employees, market experts, and take into account the data at the analytics stage

list.title: Interactive design
list.text: Let's assemble a clickable interactive version of the application (pre-MVP) in Principe to test hypotheses or demonstrate to an investor.

tasks.title: Attracting attention
tasks.text: We help you stand out among competitive solutions, surprise and attract the attention of a sophisticated user.

tasks.title: Creating emotions
tasks.text: Presenting business ideas beautifully and concisely. Striving to get into the very heart of users with visual metaphors and other means of figurative expression.

tasks.title: We are leading to the goal
tasks.text: We keep the user's focus on an interesting, but clear and simple way to achieve the necessary goals.

image.alt: We are leading to the goal
We are leading to the goal
We are leading to the goal
We are leading to the goal

process.title: Workshop
process.description: The first meeting of the studio and client teams — we get acquainted, hug, synchronize, collect wishes, clarify goals, immerse ourselves in the project.

process.title: Analytics and design
process.description: We analyze everything we have collected, as well as the best practices. We look at competitors, build scenarios, determine the style and structure.

process.title: Design concept
process.description: In a beautiful video, we show the customer and developers how the application will "live" after development and interact with the user.

process.title: Screen design, graphics creation, data visualization
process.description: We are laying the foundation for a design system. We do everything with our own hands, inhouse and with love.

process.title: Pre-MVP creation and test
process.description: Optional сreating a no-code solution based on Principle. This is something that can be shown to an investor or future users, to get an OS.

process.title: Project development
process.description: We continue to work in parallel with the development team. We put ready-made screens to work in portions, and help develop the design system.

tech.text: We work in tandem with trusted partners in mobile and web application development. We are proficient in collaborating effectively with both the client’s development team and third-party contractors.

cases.title: cases
cases.subtitle: the result of our work
cases.description: This is a creative design system that allows you to effectively develop a product throughout its life
